<static> cli.main(opts)
main function called when script is accessed through the command line.
Parameters:
{Object} opts
Options object.
{String} opts.infile Optional, Default: stdin
The name of the file to be read, also accepts from stdin.
{String} opts.outfile Optional, Default: stdout
The name of the file to write results to

Reads from stdin and calls the callback on the data received.

{Function} cb
The callback function to execute on the received data.
